technologies.name: WordPress
technologies.description: WordPress is a free and open-source content management system written in PHP and paired with a MySQL or MariaDB database. Features include a plugin architecture and a template system.

technologies.name: MySQL
technologies.description: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system.

technologies.name: PHP
technologies.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language used for web development.

technologies.name: GeneratePress
technologies.description: GeneratePress is a lightweight WordPress theme that focuses on speed, stability, and accessibility

technologies.name: Bootstrap
technologies.description: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains CSS and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.

technologies.name: WP Rocket
technologies.description: WP Rocket is a caching and performance optimisation plugin to improve the loading speed of WordPress websites.

technologies.name: GeneratePress GP Premium
technologies.description: GP Premium is a premium add-on plugin for the GeneratePress WordPress theme.

technologies.name: Popup Maker
technologies.description: Popup Maker is a plugin that lets you create popup windows for your WordPress website.

technologies.name: TablePress
technologies.description: TablePress is a free and open source plugin for the WordPress publishing platform. It enables you to create and manage tables on your website, without any coding knowledge.

technologies.name: Apache HTTP Server
technologies.description: Apache is a free and open-source cross-platform web server software.

technologies.name: Polylang
technologies.description: Polylang is a WordPress plugin which allows you to create multilingual WordPress site.

technologies.name: Moove GDPR Consent
technologies.description: Moove GDPR Consent is a GDPR Cookie Compliance plugin for Wordpress.

technologies.name: Lightbox
technologies.description: Lightbox is small javascript library used to overlay images on top of the current page.

technologies.name: Google Tag Manager
technologies.description: Google Tag Manager is a tag management system (TMS) that allows you to quickly and easily update measurement codes and related code fragments collectively known as tags on your website or mobile app.

technologies.name: Umami
technologies.description: Umami is a self-hosted web analytics solution. It's goal is to provide a friendlier, privacy-focused alternative to Google Analytics and a free, open-sourced alternative to paid solutions.

technologies.name: jQuery UI
technologies.description: jQuery UI is a collection of GUI widgets, animated visual effects, and themes implemented with jQuery, Cascading Style Sheets, and HTML.

technologies.name: jQuery Migrate
technologies.description: Query Migrate is a javascript library that allows you to preserve the compatibility of your jQuery code developed for versions of jQuery older than 1.9.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

technologies.name: Google Analytics
technologies.description: Google Analytics is a free web analytics service that tracks and reports website traffic.

technologies.name: Facebook Pixel
technologies.description: Facebook pixel is an analytics tool that allows you to measure the effectiveness of your advertising.

technologies.name: core-js
technologies.description: core-js is a modular standard library for JavaScript, with polyfills for cutting-edge ECMAScript features.

technologies.name: Flickity
technologies.description: Flickity is a JavaScript slider library, built by David DeSandro of Metafizzy fame.

technologies.name: Bootstrap Icons
technologies.description: Bootstrap Icons is a growing library of SVG icons that are designed by @mdo and maintained by the Bootstrap Team.

technologies.name: Microsoft 365
technologies.description: Microsoft 365 is a line of subscription services offered by Microsoft as part of the Microsoft Office product line.

technologies.name: Webpack
technologies.description: Webpack is an open-source JavaScript module bundler.

technologies.name: RSS
technologies.description: RSS is a family of web feed formats used to publish frequently updated works—such as blog entries, news headlines, audio, and video—in a standardized format.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.

technologies.name: Module Federation
technologies.description: Module Federation is a webpack technology for dynamically loading parts of other independently deployed builds.
